name: CPTextButton
desc: A button that displays a stylized title.

items.name: init(title: String, textStyle: CPTextButtonStyle, handler: ((CPTextButton) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Creates a button that displays a title in a specific style.

items.name: var textStyle: CPTextButtonStyle
items.desc: The text style the button applies to its title.

items.name: enum CPTextButtonStyle
items.desc: The styles a button can apply to its title to communicate its action.
